title: Ticket #1462: DAG-level NOOP jobs are awfully slow
description:
DAG-level NOOP jobs (which are not actually even submitted to the schedd) seem to be a lot slower than they should be. (You can try this out with the job_dagman_large_dag test -- almost all of the node jobs are DAG-level NOOPs.)

At this point I kind of suspect that most of the time is consumed in writing the log events, but I haven't looked into it enough to be sure.
creator: wenger
